subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Former Michigan State running back Jehuu Caulcrick lost count of the number of people he saw shot, stabbed, left for dead when he was in Liberia, the nation of his birth.
snippet: Former Michigan State running back Jehuu Caulcrick lost count of the number of people he saw shot, stabbed, left for dead when he was in Liberia, the nation of his birth.
